metaData.title: The Daffodils meadow 'Negrileasa'. Bike trail
metaData.description: In May, a white blanket of daffodils and their lovely smell offer you an unforgettable experience in the Negrileasa meadow.

specificArticles.textContent: The daffodils starts blooming in May and they lives until the beginning of June. Annually, on the Sunday closest to the 20th May there is the Daffodils holiday, when the locals sell their homemade goods, and make parties in the evening . The road to get there is asphalted, except for the last 4km, which we recommend to walk, because the landscapes are spectacular. To make your trip even more exciting, go by bike. It’s worth taking the effort!

list.textOnMouseOver: cycling duration of the round trip

specificArticles.textContent: A trip to the nature reserve 'Negrileasa' while the daffodils are in bloom is something that you will never forget. The first thing that you will try to remember from 'Negrileasa' is the the smell of the daffodils. You will realise it’s impossible to remember it, therefore you have to try this experience again, to see the white hill, feel the smell, enjoy this meadow in 'Apuseni' mountains.

images.title: Daffodil Meadow
images.description: Please don't reap the flowers. Once reaped will wither quickly and lose their smell... Their magic is only here in the wild. Instead take a lot of pictures :)
